snippet: The Pro Football Hall of Fame has worked to burnish its legacy by revamping its museum and programs to prepare for the centennial of the founding of what became the N.F.L.
abstract: Pro Football Hall of Fame's efforts to better preserve and share its collection have increased visits and brand visibility as it prepares for 100th anniversary of founding of what became the National Football League.
lead_paragraph: The Pro Football Hall of Fame has worked to burnish its legacy by revamping its museum and programs to prepare for the centennial of the founding of what became the N.F.L.

headline.main: Football’s Hall of Fame Enjoys Boom to Go With Busts
headline.print_headline: Hall Enjoys Boom to Go With Busts
